document_data.name: Maram il Vass's Servant
document_data.mainbody: An '''unnamed servant''' attended the [[ultroloth]] [[Maram il Vass]] in the [[Deep Wastes]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/It's All in the Blood|16}}
document_data.Personality: The long years of servitude had completely conditioned him into unquestioningly serving the yugoloth. He had even lost his name.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], the servant welcomed the guests of his master at the door of his lair.
